Summary: A bright sphere appeared followed by three wings
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Matteson
There were no other sightings in Matteson on or around August 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east on rt 30 at the stop light on Cicero when I saw a sphere in the eastern sky against the sun set. The sphere disapeared. A few minuts later while in a parking lot by the Holiday Inn I saw a wing shaped black craft lifting vertically into the sky. It had a jet trail that formed an inverted V shape behind it as opposed to a side by side jet trail. As it slowly lifted and accended through clouds my girlfriend ( whom I had called to look as she works in an office building off of Cicero and had a higher view ) also saw the craft ( and has since seen another recently. ) While watching two other crafts shot across the sky momentairly leaving the same V trail behind them and were gone. ( I'm not a Star Trek fan but when their ship jets away at the end of the show was the clostest thing I could relate to this as I could almost see them speed up and away. ) Eventyally I noticed that this black wing had no blinking lights as a airline plane does ( we get two airports worth of traffic in south Cook county, I know what a plane looks like.). Eventually, I lost track of it in some clouds well after it had passed over head and began to head east. Later I thought that it looked kinda like the stealth bomer or something. My sister said she saw a triangle craft that same night, but I can't vouch for that. BTW, I tried to video tape it but I have a crappy samsung phone to thank for nothing showing up.
